bug.author: chenmiaogit
bug.summary: Word2Vec getLayerSize() method doesn't return the correct layer size
bug.description: I loaded the Google word2vec model using model = (Word2Vec) WordVectorSerializer.loadGoogleModel(gModel, true); and then I want to find the layer size by using model.getLayerSize(), but this doesn't return me the correct layer size -- it should be 300, but what it returns is 100.

comments.comment: Fixed on current master. Thanks for highlighting this issue.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
